mapper.sql: INTEGRAL_DETAIL_ID, INTEGRAL_ID, INTEGRAL_CHANGE, CREATE_TIME, CHANGE_TYPE, INTEGRAL_FROM, INTEGRAL_TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_integral_detail (INTEGRAL_DETAIL_ID, INTEGRAL_ID, INTEGRAL_CHANGE, CREATE_TIME, CHANGE_TYPE, INTEGRAL_FROM, INTEGRAL_TYPE) values (#{integralDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integralId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integralChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{integralFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integralType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sys_user_integral_detail
INTEGRAL_DETAIL_ID,
INTEGRAL_ID,
INTEGRAL_CHANGE,
CREATE_TIME,
CHANGE_TYPE,
INTEGRAL_FROM,
INTEGRAL_TYPE,
#{integralDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{integralId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{integralChange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{integralFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{integralType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update sys_user_integral_detail
INTEGRAL_ID = #{integralId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRAL_CHANGE = #{integralChange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHANGE_TYPE = #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INTEGRAL_FROM = #{integralFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRAL_TYPE = #{integralType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where INTEGRAL_DETAIL_ID = #{integralDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user_integral_detail set INTEGRAL_ID = #{integralId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRAL_CHANGE = #{integralChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHANGE_TYPE = #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INTEGRAL_FROM = #{integralFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRAL_TYPE = #{integralType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where INTEGRAL_DETAIL_ID = #{integralDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user_integral_detail where INTEGRAL_ID = #{integralId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND INTEGRAL_TYPE=5

SELECT u.`USER_ID` FROM `cms_terminal_user` u WHERE u.user_id NOT IN (SELECT i.`USER_ID` FROM `sys_user_integral` i WHERE i.`INTEGRAL_ID` IN (SELECT d.`INTEGRAL_ID` FROM `sys_user_integral_detail` d WHERE d.`INTEGRAL_TYPE`=1)) AND u.REGISTER_ORIGIN=1
